Woah... After Volcanic got a lot of attention... I was thinking about making this, WaterFall, which will contain more features and games modes... Hehe, u can also call this Volcanic 2, but it doesn't has anything related with Volcanoes

=======================================

Welcome to Waterfall!

You're a little Water Drop, which adventure will you have today?

=======================================

This game was made by » M2030 Games «

Specially by @madrid2030

=======================================

It isn't generic, so coments saying that it's generic will be removed...

=======================================

Instructions:  

  ★ Move with arrows keys or w,a,s,d.

   ★ Four different types of modes.

   ★ Obstacles Rush: Avoid spikes jumping. [1 Point per 

        second] - Bit Hard

   ★ Fly Mode: Avoid Falling Meteorites. [1 Point per 

        second] Also, if you click space bar and you touch a    

        meteorite, you get 5 points! *** THE METEORIE 

      DOESN'T HAS TO DISSAPEAR*** - Normal

   ★ Laser Mode: Avoid Lasers. [1 Point per  

         second] - Hard

   ★ Collect Mode: Collect Falling Coins!. [1 Point per 

        second] [Some stars +5 points] - Easy

   ★ 3 Lives on each type of mode.

   ★ Click to change your skin.

   ★ Developer list/sprite: click to close
